review: *** ** *** ** *** **** ******* **** **** ****** *** *** ****** ******* ** ** ******* He was very kind and most importantly very very patient with me (as I tend to be really scared to visit a dentist). review: clinic is neat and clean and well maintained, and the doctor and  staffs are polite and co operative.

tags: None
review:
I had a tooth ache and what he recommended was scaling. On top of that he loaded me with antibiotics and pain killer . Even they did not gave me receipt of consulting and scaling . The lame reason was there printer is not working . I requested them to share the receipt on mail which they agreed but till date i have not received any.

Anyways i will never recommend the doctor to anyone. If you are very adventures you might like to visit him on your own risk.
reply_text: Mr. Awasthi, sorry to hear about your troubles. Extremely sorry about the invoice/receipt issue. The same has been mailed to you. As far as your treatment is concerned, you were advised to undergo scaling as well as extraction. As you were about to travel, you refused to undergo extraction at that point, opting for scaling only. As you had come with toothache a prescription of antibiotics and painkillers were given. Also OPG X-Ray  was advised. You had also cancelled a further follow up appointment and had said you will reschedule. Hopefully once you are back we can schedule an appointment to complete your treatment. Take care.
